content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause involving multiple parties referred to as mt me and mg the text mentions various properties such as apartments garages and a building courtyard located in morrovalle it provides cadastral data and income information for each property the text then discusses the division of these properties among the parties with each party receiving a specific share the value of each share is specified and the remaining balance for each party is determined the parties agree to the terms and release any claims or mortgages the text concludes with the details of the notary and the date of the document
